name: Bugatti Chiron
beschreibung: The Chiron is a supercar that's synonymous with speed, luxury and exclusivity. It's powered by an 8.0-liter W16 engine that can deliver up to 1,500 horsepower.

name: Lamborghini Aventador SVJ
beschreibung: The Aventador SVJ is a track-focused version of Lamborghini's flagship supercar. It's powered by a naturally aspirated V12 engine that can deliver up to 759 horsepower.

name: Rolls Royce
beschreibung: The Sweptail is a one-of-a-kind bespoke creation that was commissioned by a private customer. It features an elegant and unique design, and is powered by a 6.75-liter V12 engine.

name: Koenigsegg Jesko
beschreibung: The Jesko is a hypercar that's built for speed and performance. It's powered by a 5.0-liter V8 engine that can deliver up to 1,600 horsepower.

name: Ferrari LaFerrari
beschreibung: The LaFerrari Aperta is an open-top version of Ferrari's flagship hybrid supercar. It's powered by a V12 engine and an electric motor, and can deliver up to 950 horsepower.
